thread.title: Breakdown of how Ducks QBs have fared
thread.title_full: Breakdown of how Ducks QBs have fared

title: Breakdown of how Ducks QBs have fared
text:
Breakdown of how Ducks QBs have fared Pete Martini , Statesman Journal 5:19 p.m. PDT October 19, 2015 Oct 17, 2015; Seattle, WA, USA; Oregon Ducks quarterback Vernon Adams Jr. (3) looks to pass against the Washington Huskies during the first quarter at Husky Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Jennifer Buchanan-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Jennifer Nicholson-USA TODAY Sports) 2 CONNECT 2 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
This season has not exactly gone to plan for Oregon's football team, and issues at quarterback have been the driving force. 
The Ducks, who are 4-3 this season, have used three quarterbacks, not including wide receiver Bralon Addison, who has been used at quarterback in certain offensive packages. 
Here is a look at what those three quarterbacks have done this season: 
OREGON QUARTERBACK BREAKDOWN 
Player Comp-Att-Int Yards TD Rushes-Yards-TD 
Vernon Adams 57-96-2 853 6 42-117-1 
Jeff Lockie 54-84-4 544 5 31-109-0 
Taylor Alie 6-14-0 96 1 10-142-3 
Oct 3, 2015; Boulder, CO, USA; Oregon Ducks quarterback Jeff Lockie (17) prepares to pass in the second quarter against the Colorado Buffaloes at Folsom Field. Mandatory Credit: Ron Chenoy-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Ron Chenoy-USA TODAY Sports) 2 CONNECT 2 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://stjr.nl/1RT6o5V TOP VIDEOS
